135.title: Golden Books
notes:
The name of a publisher of children's books, sometimes given in full as Golden Books Publishing Company. The series or imprint A Golden Book (published by Western Publishing Company as well as by Golden Books) confuses the bibliography, as do the related series designations
  • A Golden All-Star Book
  • A Golden Little Look-Look Book
  • A Golden Look-Look Book
  • A Golden Shape Book
  • A Golden Super Shape Book
  • A Golden Tell-a-Tale Book
  • A Little Golden Book
  • The Little Golden Library
